verses.verse: And Adam<WH120> knew<WH3045> Eve<WH2332> his wife;<WH802> and she conceived,<WH2029> and bore<WH3205> Cain,<WH7014> and said,<WH559> I have gotten<WH7069> a man<WH376> from the LORD.<WH3068>
And she again<WH3254> bore<WH3205> his brother<WH251> Abel.<WH1893> And Abel<WH1893> was a keeper<WH7462> of sheep,<WH6629> but Cain<WH7014> was a tiller<WH5647> of the ground.<WH127>
And in process<WH7093> of time<WH3117> it came<WH1961> to pass, that Cain<WH7014> brought<WH935> of the fruit<WH6529> of the ground<WH127> an offering<WH4503> to the LORD.<WH3068>

And Abel,<WH1893> he also<WH1571> brought<WH935> of the firstborn<WH1062> of his flock<WH6629> and of the fat<WH2459> thereof. And the LORD<WH3068> had respect<WH8159> to Abel<WH1893> and to his offering:<WH4503>
But to Cain<WH7014> and to his offering<WH4503> he had not respect.<WH8159> And Cain<WH7014> was very<WH3966> wroth,<WH2734> and his countenance<WH6440> fell.<WH5307>
And the LORD<WH3068> said<WH559> to Cain,<WH7014> Why<WH4100> are you wroth?<WH2734> and why<WH4100> is your countenance<WH6440> fallen?<WH5307>

If<WH518> you do well,<WH3190> shall you not be accepted?<WH7613> and if<WH518> you do not well,<WH3190> sin<WH2403> lies<WH7257> at the door.<WH6607> And to you shall be his desire,<WH8669> and you shall rule<WH4910> over him.

And Cain<WH7014> talked<WH559> with Abel<WH1893> his brother:<WH251> and it came<WH1961> to pass, when they were in the field,<WH7704> that Cain<WH7014> rose<WH6965> up against<WH413> Abel<WH1893> his brother,<WH251> and slew<WH2026> him.
And the LORD<WH3068> said<WH559> to Cain,<WH7014> Where<WH335> is Abel<WH1893> your brother?<WH251> And he said,<WH559> I know<WH3045> not: Am I my brother's<WH251> keeper?<WH8104>
And he said,<WH559> What<WH4100> have you done?<WH6213> the voice<WH6963> of your brother's<WH251> blood<WH1818> cries<WH6817> to me from the ground.<WH127>
And now<WH6258> are you cursed<WH779> from the earth,<WH127> which<WH834> has opened<WH6475> her mouth<WH6310> to receive<WH3947> your brother's<WH251> blood<WH1818> from your hand;<WH3027>

When<WH3588> you till<WH5647> the ground,<WH127> it shall not from now on<WH3254> yield<WH5414> to you her strength;<WH3581> a fugitive<WH5128> and a vagabond<WH5110> shall you be in the earth.<WH776>
And Cain<WH7014> said<WH559> to the LORD,<WH3068> My punishment<WH5771> is greater<WH1419> than I can bear.<WH5375>

Behold,<WH2005> you have driven<WH1644> me out this day<WH3117> from the face<WH6440> of the earth;<WH127> and from your face<WH6440> shall I be hid;<WH5641> and I shall be a fugitive<WH5128> and a vagabond<WH5110> in the earth;<WH776> and it shall come<WH1961> to pass, that every<WH3605> one that finds<WH4672> me shall slay<WH2026> me.

And the LORD<WH3068> said<WH559> to him, Therefore<WH3651> whoever<WH3605> slays<WH2026> Cain,<WH7014> vengeance<WH5358> shall be taken on him sevenfold.<WH7659> And the LORD<WH3068> set<WH7760> a mark<WH226> on Cain,<WH7014> lest<WH1115> any<WH3605> finding<WH4672> him should kill<WH5221> him.
And Cain<WH7014> went<WH3318> out from the presence<WH6440> of the LORD,<WH3068> and dwelled<WH3427> in the land<WH776> of Nod,<WH5113> on the east<WH6926> of Eden.<WH5731>

And Cain<WH7014> knew<WH3045> his wife;<WH802> and she conceived,<WH2029> and bore<WH3205> Enoch:<WH2585> and he built<WH1129> a city,<WH5892> and called<WH7121> the name<WH8034> of the city,<WH5892> after the name<WH8034> of his son,<WH1121> Enoch.<WH2585>

And to Enoch<WH2585> was born<WH3205> Irad:<WH5897> and Irad<WH5897> begat<WH3205> Mehujael:<WH4232> and Mehujael<WH4232> begat<WH3205> Methusael:<WH4967> and Methusael<WH4967> begat<WH3205> Lamech.<WH3929>
And Lamech<WH3929> took<WH3947> to him two<WH8147> wives:<WH802> the name<WH8034> of the one<WH259> was Adah,<WH5711> and the name<WH8034> of the other<WH8145> Zillah.<WH6741>
And Adah<WH5711> bore<WH3205> Jabal:<WH2989> he was the father<WH1> of such as dwell<WH3427> in tents,<WH168> and of such as have cattle.<WH4735>
And his brother's<WH251> name<WH8034> was Jubal:<WH3106> he was the father<WH1> of all<WH3605> such as handle<WH8610> the harp<WH3658> and organ.<WH5748>

And Zillah,<WH6741> she also<WH1571> bore<WH3205> Tubalcain,<WH8423> an instructor<WH3913> of every<WH3605> artificer<WH2794> in brass<WH5178> and iron:<WH1270> and the sister<WH269> of Tubalcain<WH8423> was Naamah.<WH5279>

And Lamech<WH3929> said<WH559> to his wives,<WH802> Adah<WH5711> and Zillah,<WH6741> Hear<WH8085> my voice;<WH6963> you wives<WH802> of Lamech,<WH3929> listen<WH238> to my speech:<WH565> for I have slain<WH2026> a man<WH376> to my wounding,<WH6482> and a young<WH3206> man to my hurt.<WH2250>
If<WH3588> Cain<WH7014> shall be avenged<WH5358> sevenfold,<WH7659> truly Lamech<WH3929> seventy<WH7657> and sevenfold.<WH7659>

And Adam<WH120> knew<WH3045> his wife<WH802> again;<WH5750> and she bore<WH3205> a son,<WH1121> and called<WH7121> his name<WH8034> Seth:<WH8352> For God,<WH430> said she, has appointed<WH7896> me another<WH312> seed<WH2233> instead<WH8478> of Abel,<WH1893> whom<WH3588> Cain<WH7014> slew.<WH2026>

And to Seth,<WH8352> to him also<WH1571> there was born<WH3205> a son;<WH1121> and he called<WH7121> his name<WH8034> Enos:<WH583> then<WH227> began<WH2490> men to call<WH7121> on the name<WH8034> of the LORD.<WH3068>
